items.text: G7 POLL: Growing perception of US as geopolitical threat — sentiment shifts most dramatic in CANADA, INDIA, SOUTH AFRICA over past 12 months (TASS)

IRAN President RAISI publicly denies nuclear weapons ambitions at UN General Assembly — signals potential diplomatic opening amid ongoing IAEA investigations into uranium enrichment activities (Guardian)

Rationale: 
- High-level statement from Iranian leadership about nucle...
RUSSIA tests new integrated air defense system in UKRAINE combat zone: PANTSIR platforms enhanced with advanced airspace control technology (TASS)
EU DEFENSE MINISTERS approve major military mobility enhancement plan targeting RUSSIA border regions - increased troop/equipment transit capabilities across member states (DW)
ARMY MOBILIZES MPs for potential MINNEAPOLIS deployment amid ongoing civil unrest - preparedness order issued (AP)
EUROPE prepares potential war economic mobilization: Defense production ramp-up signals major strategic shift amid ongoing UKRAINE conflict, heightened military readiness (GIS Reports)
VENEZUELA Pres. NICOLAS MADURO detained by US authorities, transported to NEW YORK on unspecified charges - potential major diplomatic escalation with VENEZUELA (Al Jazeera)
AFGHANISTAN: Security forces launch military operation against militants in GHAZNI province - multiple targets engaged, ongoing operation reported (Xinhua)
SOUTH KOREA transfers 222 military vehicles to CAMBODIA as part of defense cooperation agreement - first major military aid package to Phnom Penh (Xinhua)
ISRAEL mobilizes 60,000 military reservists for expanded GAZA ground operation - imminent major offensive signaled by IDF troop call-up (NPR)
PENTAGON: Top military leadership convenes urgent, rare all-flag officer conference — potential strategic review or operational planning signaled by mass general/admiral assembly (Detroit News)
US ARMY deploys AeroVironment LOCUST counter-drone laser system near EL PASO airport in first known operational deployment of directed-energy anti-drone technology (Reuters)
GAZA: Families cross RAFAH border crossing, returning to devastated PALESTINIAN territories after weeks of conflict with ISRAEL; humanitarian crisis continues (Al Jazeera)
ARGENTINA: Security forces clash with protesters in BUENOS AIRES - water cannon, tear gas deployed against labour reform demonstration (Al Jazeera)
RUSSIA accuses UKRAINE of targeting civilians in BELGOROD region during ongoing settlement talks - multiple drone/missile strikes reported, civilian casualties confirmed (TASS)
PENTAGON warns of potential foreign election interference: Enhanced cybersecurity protocols activated for 2024 national elections — intelligence agencies on high alert (DHS)
RUSSIA: Foreign Ministry slams EU leadership, claims UKRAINE terrorism accusations unaddressed by EU officials - diplomatic tensions escalate (TASS)
UK CARRIER STRIKE GROUP returns after 8-month global deployment: HMS QUEEN ELIZABETH leads maritime mission through Indo-Pacific, demonstrating ROYAL NAVY power projection capabilities (USNI)
RUSSIA deploys new GIATSINT-K self-propelled howitzers to UKRAINE frontline — artillery reinforcement in KHARKOV region (TASS)
NORTH KOREA preparing to designate KIM Jong Un's daughter KIM Ju-ae as successor, SOUTH KOREAN intelligence agency NIS reports - potential first female leader in regime history (Yonhap)
BREAKING: UN SECURITY COUNCIL convenes emergency session following U.S. military strikes against IRAN-backed targets - diplomatic tensions escalate in Middle East (PBS)
SOUTH KOREA military chief warns troops to maintain "firm readiness" near NORTH KOREA border - heightened tensions signal potential escalation (Yonhap)
CSTO plans 60 joint military drills across KAZAKHSTAN, RUSSIA, TAJIKISTAN, BELARUS in 2024 - 8 command & staff exercises confirmed by Joint Staff chief (TASS)
CSTO warns WEST seeking expanded influence in SOUTH CAUCASUS - region remains "volatile" with unresolved conflicts, geopolitical pressures building (TASS)
UKRAINE: KYIV reports 2,600 residential buildings without heating after RUSSIA missile strikes targeting energy infrastructure — mayor confirms critical civilian infrastructure damage (TASS)
RUSSIA suffers 770 military casualties in UKRAINE over past 24hrs - total losses continue to mount amid ongoing conflict (Ukrinform)
NORTH KOREA launches multiple ballistic missiles into waters between KOREA and JAPAN - first test since joint US-SOUTH KOREA military drills concluded (Yonhap)
PENTAGON defense strategy highlights NORTH KOREA missile/nuclear threat - first strategic document to drop explicit denuclearization language since 2018 (NK News)
KREMLIN: PESKOV suggests potential TRUMP invite to MOSCOW Victory Day Parade - diplomatic signal amid U.S. election tensions (TASS)
RUSSIA: FSB prevents terror plot in UDMURTIA - suspect with prior extremist convictions detained in MOZHGA, targeting local police (TASS)
